title: GoLow Golf - PGA Playoff Reaction, JT Time, Mito Collapse, Tiger Silver Lining
itunes:title: GoLow Golf - PGA Playoff Reaction, JT Time, Mito Collapse, Tiger Silver Lining
description:
John reacts to Justin Thomas winning a wild PGA Championship playoff over Will Zalatoris at Southern Hills, Mito Pereira’s cringeworthy 72nd hole collapse, and why Tiger’s Friday round was so impressive. #herd

Follow John and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
